Extracted Variables:
- x: number of kids size bottles
- y: number of adult size bottles

Extracted Constraints:
- Constraint 1: x \geq 50 (At least 50 kids size bottles must be made)
- Constraint 2: 100x + 300y \leq 25000 (Total amount of cough syrup available)
- Constraint 3: y \geq 3x (At least 3 times as many adult size bottles must be made as kids size bottles)

Extracted Objective:
- Maximize z = x + y
